title: Researchers optimize aptamer with enhanced myelin-binding properties for MS treatment

title_detail.value: Researchers optimize aptamer with enhanced myelin-binding properties for MS treatment

summary: A new study has demonstrated the enhanced ability of an optimized 20-nucleotide derivative of a larger DNA aptamer to bind myelin in a mouse model of multiple sclerosis.

summary_detail.value: A new study has demonstrated the enhanced ability of an optimized 20-nucleotide derivative of a larger DNA aptamer to bind myelin in a mouse model of multiple sclerosis.
